name: SAP-icon web font
tagline: SAP-icon web font for Axure prototypes
body:
### SAP-icon font in Axure prototypes
1. Download the Axure stencil at: http://experience.sap.com/fiori-design/resources/downloads/  
1. Install the [SAP-icon font](https://sapui5.netweaver.ondemand.com/sdk/resources/sap/ui/core/themes/base/fonts/SAP-icons.ttf) on your computer.

### Making SAP-icon available on Axure Share
For viewers of the prototype that does not have the font installed, you can add the web-font by adding a reference to the CSS-file: http://perchristian.github.io/sapiconfont/sapicons.css.

Here is how:

1. Select "Publish to Axure Share" (F6)
1. Click "Edit" configuration
1. Select "Web Fonts"
1. Click "+" to add new Web Font
1. Enter name "SAP-icons" (or any other name)
1. Paste this URL into the URL field: http://perchristian.github.io/sapiconfont/sapicons.css
1. Click OK

The SAP-icon font used in this repository is currently v3.001
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
